item.title: CS251 Introduction: What is Computer Science?
item.description: Computer Science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes. – Edsger Wybe Dijkstra What about Mathematics? Before diving into the question of what is computer science, let’s deal with the question of what is mathematics first. Obviously it is a big question that no one would ever be confident to answer to. However, I still want to share some of my ideas of what mathematics is.
